item.description:
CLOSED! YOU MISSED YOUR CHANCE! This may be your only chance this season to meet Red Sox Natives Member Kevin Perito!

Kevin will be driving up from Rhode Island to attend the Sox game, and this is our chance to personally welcome a Rhode Island member to the Natives!

We will meet at the Game On! bar, and listen as Kevin speaks of his lifelong journey from Bellingham MA to Rumford, RI.

So join us for a random kick off to a Saturday night in Boston, then stick around to watch the Sox game with your fellow Natives while Kevin ditches us for the live action of Fenway.

For all you who join and say you want to come out to watch a game with other Sox fans, here is your chance!
item.name: Meet Kevin Perito!
